channel.title: opentitan on CHIPS Alliance
channel.description: Recent content in opentitan on CHIPS Alliance

item.title: Enabling Open Source Ibex Synthesis and Simulation in Verilator/Yosys via UHDM/Surelog
item.description: This post was originally published at Antmicro. Throughout 2020 we were hard at work developing proper, portable SystemVerilog support for multiple open-source FPGA and ASIC design tools used by us and our customers, most notably Yosys and Verilator. We strongly believe that the support is a necessary step in building a collaborative ecosystem and scalable and reproducible CIs, especially publicly accessible ones that are common in multi-organization projects such as OpenTitan and CHIPS Alliance.
